#summary renderPartial(name[cache])
#labels api,0.8,controller,request

*Description*:

Renders content to the browser by including a partial.

*Return Type*:

Void

*

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *name* || string || true ||  || Name of partial to include ||
|| *cache* || any || false ||  || Minutes to cache the content for ||

*Usage*:

-

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset renderPartial("comment")>

}}}

*Related*:

 * RenderingPages (chapter)
 * [renderPageToString renderPageToString()] (function)
 * [renderPage renderPage()] (function)
 * [renderNothing renderNothing()] (function)
 * [renderText renderText()] (function)
